Name: Fulvous Whistling Duck
Best seen at: Rishikesh, Keoladeo National Park, Kaziranga National Park
How to identify: Brown body with black and white markings, long legs, whistling call

Name: Lesser Whistling Duck
Best seen at: Keoladeo National Park, Kaziranga National Park, Sundarbans
How to identify: Smaller than Fulvous Whistling Duck, brown body with white belly and black markings, whistling call

Name: Bar-headed Goose
Best seen at: Rann of Kutch, Ladakh, Bharatpur Bird Sanctuary
Migration status: Migratory (Breeds in Central Asia, winters in India)
How to identify: Large, grey body with black head and white bars, distinctive pink bill

Name: Greylag Goose
Best seen at: Hemis National Park, Ladakh, Pangong Tso
How to identify: Large, grey body with orange beak and legs

Name: Comb Duck
Best seen at: Kaziranga National Park, Manas National Park, Keoladeo National Park
How to identify: Large, black body with white head and crest, distinctive red knob on bill
